MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.label: Enchantment of Dragonkind
MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.description: An ancient magic infused with the essence of dragon scales. When applied, it hardens the wearer's skin to resist cutting blows and grants complete immunity to flames. The enchantment radiates a comforting warmth and sometimes emits a faint sound like distant draconic breathing.

MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.label: Enchantment of Sunlight
MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.description: A blessing drawn from celestial energies that shifts with the passage of day and night. During daylight hours, it creates a shimmering golden aura that disperses heat, allowing the bearer to walk unharmed through the most scorching environments. As darkness falls, its power wanes until dawn renews its strength.

MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.label: Enchantment of Volatile Energies
MagicAndMyths.EnchantDef.description: A dangerous arcane formula developed by vindictive battle-mages. This enchantment surrounds the bearer with unstable energies that violently rebound upon attackers. When struck, these energies flare with brilliant purple light, sending a portion of the force back to its source. Even successful attackers find themselves unexpectedly wounded by their own blows.
